name: Squadron: Sky Guardians
description: The game is the story of three Iranian Air Force pilots combatting the enemy as part of simulated operations at three different time periods. The exact coordinates of all simulated settings and combats are accessible through aerial maps. In addition, the entire game setting has been designed using satellite maps.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7/8/10 处理器: 2.8 GHz (dual Core) processor or higher 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 730, ATI Radeon 6650  or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7/8/10 处理器: 2.8 GHz (dual Core) processor or higher 内存: 3 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 730, ATI Radeon 6650  or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
